experiences.title: Student Committee, External Affairs
description: Managed and lead teams of people as head of activities. Organized recreational activity sections including activity booths, gameshow, academic showcase, and sports in various faculty events.

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
experiences.company: Department of Computer Engineering, Chulalongkorn University
description: Teaching assistant in Computer Programming, Data Structures, and Algorithm for Computer Engineering students in Chulalongkorn University.

experiences.title: Head of Activities
description: Organized and led activities for the youth group of Antioch Baptist Church. Activities include applied bible study classes, afternoon activities, special outings, and community service projects.

experiences.title: Math Tutor
description: Tutoring primary and secondary students online with personalized lesson plans. From teaching basic classroom lesson to tutoring students for competitive secondary high schools.

experiences.title: Portfolio Advising
description: Advicing high school students on their portfolio for University both in Thailand and abroad

experiences.title: Class Representative of Student Committee
description: Participated in student council meetings and communicating information though class as well as organized school events such as Loy Krathong Festival

experiences.title: President of Academic Camp
description: Designed and directed the overall flow of STEM academic activities for 140 5th graders at Wat Thakam School in a one-day camp.
Created a technology activities based on AI as well and run a workshop for the kids.

experiences.title: Head of Stage
description: Planned and organized the stage performance for the school open house event and contacted the musicians dancers and MC.
